title: 26. Movie - MOD SUN
text: Mod Sun back at it. MOD SUN BACK AT IT!! by Ayobee21 Amazing artist with an amazing soul, spirit and vibe . Can't wait till the rest of the songs on the album drops. I hope to see you one day I concert. ðŸ’¯ðŸ˜‡ Biography Genre: Hip-Hop/Rap Years Active: '00s, '10s Standing for "Movement on Dreams Stand Under None," Mod Sun is the hip-hop moniker of Bloomington, Minnesota rapper Derek Smith. He entered the music business as a drummer in the post-hardcore group Four Letter Lie, and took the moniker Mod Sun in 2004; he left Four Letter Lie in 2009 to join Scary Kids Scaring Kids as their drummer, but SKSK's live shows were also an opportunity to debut Mod Sun as the opening act. Rapping became a full-time job when the group disbanded in 2010 and Mod Sun released... Top Albums and Songs by MOD SUN 1.
